interface.tp:docstring: An interface for requesting information from the Telepathy Logger service.

tp:struct.name: Favorites
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A set of favorite contacts on a specific account.

tp:member.name: Identifiers
tp:member.tp:docstring: The identifiers of the favorite contacts.

arg.name: Favourite_Contacts
arg.tp:docstring: The favourite contacts, as an array of TpAccounts and their contact identifiers.

method.name: AddFavouriteContact

arg.name: Account
arg.tp:docstring: The object path for the TpAccount to which the contact belongs

method.tp:docstring: Add a contact's designation as a favourite.

method.name: RemoveFavouriteContact

arg.name: Account
arg.tp:docstring: The object path for the TpAccount to which the contact belongs

method.tp:docstring: Remove a contact's designation as a favourite.

method.name: Clear
method.tp:docstring: Clear all the logs. This will not erase the favourite contacts.

method.name: ClearAccount

arg.name: Account
arg.tp:docstring: The object path for the TpAccount in which logs will be cleared.

method.tp:docstring: Clear all logs stored for specified account.

method.name: ClearEntity

arg.name: Account
arg.tp:docstring: The object path for the TpAccount in which logs will be cleared.

arg.name: Type
arg.tp:docstring: The entity type, should be one of TP_ENTITY_TYPE_CONTACT (1) or TP_ENTITY_TYPE_ROOM (2).

method.tp:docstring: Clear all logs stored for discussions with entity in account.

signal.name: FavouriteContactsChanged
signal.tp:docstring: The set of favourite contacts has changed.

arg.name: Account
arg.tp:docstring: An account associated with the contact.

arg.name: Added
arg.tp:docstring: List of contact identifiers of contacts which are now favourites.

arg.name: Removed
arg.tp:docstring: List of contact identifiers of contacts which are no longer favourites.
